sentence.Network_en: Herr Kohler wanted an explanation for what he described as "slanderous" remarks.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫尔·科勒希望有人能够为那些他称之为“造谣中伤”的言辞作出解释。

sentence.Network_en: Herr Schmidt is certainly the most odious man I have ever met.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫尔·施密特无疑是我见过的最让人作呕的人。

sentence.Network_en: Herr's book started life as a dramatic screenplay.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫尔的书一开始是一个电影剧本。
